description:
What does it mean to "disappear"? Suzuko and Hanna find out that out that the truth may be more terrifying than they imagined.  Hanna defeats a player and takes all of her coins, and is surprised to find the result isn`t what she expects.  And Suzuko learns from a boy who lost his little sister that the price for losing the game is paid by more people than just the loser.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セレクター / 蜜と毒
